comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Top script reversed says "1st baseman Bklyn"

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Not sure why the Committee thought this was 1918. Looks like the 1914 uniform (Daubert played for Brooklyn in both years). exhibits.baseballhalloffame.org/dressed_to_the_nines/unif... Also, this seems almost identical to www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5517545366/ dated 1914 on the glass negative.
